name: permanent magnet production, for electric motor | permanent magnet, for electric motor | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1573/documentation

[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

Includes liquid aluminium production (with its plant) used as proxy for the permanent magnets production and the materials used.

It returns the produced magnets, the waste flows and  emissions.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2599:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Some Swiss datasets are used for European processes.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Proxy for the production of a permanent magnet based on the alumium technology.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The values for the Exchanges have been take from the dataset "aluminium production, primary, liquid" as a proxy for the production efforts of a permanent magnet. Input materials for the alumium have been removed. Uncertanties have been changed accordingly. Comments from "alumium production, primary, liquid" dataset: see Geography This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

exchanges.description:
Neodymium Magnet, produced out of Neodymium, Iron and Boron Alloy.
Nd2 Fe14 B1 alloy. Mix of about 72% (14mol) iron, 27% (2mol) Rare Earth and 1% (1mol) boron.

flow.name: permanent magnet, for electric motor

exchanges.description: Original value taken from "aluminium production, primary, liquid". Uncertainty changed accordingly.

flow.name: Sulfur dioxide
flow.category: Elementary flows/Emission to air/unspecified

exchanges.description: Calculated. The amount corresponds to the iron needed in the magnet considering the fact that pig iron has circa 95% purity of iron and also considering the composition mentioned in the reference product comment of Neodymium, Iron and Boron Alloy.
